Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2007 07:29PM - edited Dec 2, 2007 07:30PM by ndpaul Thank you for this - it has helped me understand a lot of what I've been going through.  I had my bilateral mastectomy on November 13th, 2007, and my next visit to cancer clinic is on December 10th, 2007.  The emotional roller coaster is on - and the ride is making me sick. Nadine.
Posts.Title: Diary of a bilateral mastectomy twinkly pinkvictory
